articles.author: CHRIS MEGERIAN, SYLVIE CORBET, ZEKE MILLER
articles.title: Biden apologizes to Zelenskyy for monthslong congressional holdup to weapons that let Russia advance - The Associated Press
articles.description: President Joe Biden has for the first time publicly apologized to Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy for a monthslong congressional holdup in American military assistance that let Russia make battlefield gains. Biden and Zelenskyy met Friday in France, w…
articles.content: PARIS (AP) President Joe Biden on Friday for the first time publicly apologized to Ukraine for a monthslong congressional holdup in American military assistance that let Russia make gains on the batt… [+8548 chars]
